resources.string: How difficult were today\'s activities in this list?
Was it too difficult and if it was why?

string-array.name: difficultyAnswersHard
string-array.item: Yes, the tasks were too hard
Yes, there were too many tasks

string-array.name: difficultyAnswersEasy
string-array.item: No, I\'d prefer it to be tougher

resources.string: It helps to have a good environment around you while you work as it can help boost your productivity and reduce stress
It\'s important for us to set realistic goals so that we may attain them and grow.\nWould you like to edit your tasks for next time?
